DOC.brief_summary: This trial primary goal show BAY68-4986 low ventricular rate patient indication persistent atrial fibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effect A1 Agonist Capadenoson Ventricular HR Patients With Persistent Permanent Atrial Fibrillation .
DOC.criteria: Male and/or female ( without childbearing potential ) white patient History persistent permanent atrial fibrillation 18 75 year age Patients highrisk cardiovascular disease Stroke myocardial infarction Relevant pathological change ECG echocardiography Medication affect ventricular response Afib
